text: "Listen" is a song by French DJ and music producer David Guetta, featuring vocals from American singer John Legend, from the album of the same name. ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" !scope="col"|Chart (2014–2016) !scope="col"|Peak position |- |- |- !scope="row"|Italy (FIMI) |align="center"|74 |} ==Certifications== ==Release history== {|class=wikitable !Region !Date !Format !Label |- |Italy |4 March 2016 |Mainstream radio |Warner Music |} ==References== Category:2014 songs Category:2016 singles Category:Songs written by David Guetta Category:Songs written by Giorgio Tuinfort Category:Songs written by Frédéric Riesterer Category:Songs written by Jason Evigan Category:Songs written by John Legend Category:David Guetta songs Category:John Legend songs Category:Song recordings produced by David Guetta
title: Listen (David Guetta song)
